creative_heat_source.info: Transforms any Melter into a 'Creative Melter' by placing this block under it. Creative Melter has an infinite heat level and will instantly melt anything. Also it won't hurt when you or any mob standing on it.
creative_heat_source.tooltip: Infinite heat level for the Melter
item.melter.melter.tooltip.summary: A very special treat for your _Blaze Burners_. After eating this cake, Blaze Burners will _never run out of fuel_.
melter.ponder.melter.text_2: They can be heated from the below using different heat sources
melter.ponder.melter.text_3: Throw items at the top or insert from the sides
melter.ponder.melter.text_4: Outputs can be extracted by automation
